projects.name: Map Camera
projects.snippet: Minecraft Spigot Plugin that lets users create a live updating map of their screen for other players to see
projects.description: Minecraft Spigot Plugin that lets users create a live updating map of their screen for other players to see

projects.name: Auto Code Verify
projects.snippet: Chrome Extension that automatically shows a popup with verification codes sent to the users email
projects.description: Chrome Extension that automatically shows a popup with verification codes sent to the users email

projects.name: Wordle Helper
projects.snippet: Chrome Extension that prevents the user from typing letters marked as absent in Wordle
projects.description: Chrome Extension prevents the user from typing letters marked as absent in Wordle

projects.name: Death Shuffle
projects.snippet: Minecraft Spigot Plugin Minigame in which the players compete to die in a given way
projects.description: Minecraft Spigot Plugin Minigame in which the players compete to die in a given way

projects.name: PTCGO Code Farmer
projects.snippet: Java program that scans recently posted Pokémon YouTube videos for QR Codes that are redeemed for products in the online game
projects.description: Java program that scans recently posted Pokémon YouTube videos for QR Codes that are redeemed for products in the online game

projects.name: YouTube Chapter Skip
projects.snippet: Chrome Extension that adds browser keyboard shortcut to skip to next chapter of YouTube video
projects.description: Chrome Extension that adds browser keyboard shortcut to skip to next chapter of YouTube video

projects.name: Minecraft Eye Controller
projects.snippet: Minecraft Mod that allows the user to control their players camera direction with their eyes
projects.description: Minecraft Mod that allows the user to control their players camera direction with their eyes

projects.name: Computer Notifier
projects.snippet: Java Android App that shows phone notifications on a computer via the Java companion desktop program
projects.description: Java Android App that shows phone notifications on a computer via the Java companion desktop program
